game.name: We Might Die
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access
game.shortDescription: Salvage. Gear Up. Survive. Mech-based roguelike set in deep space, where an alien swarm is quickly approaching your home ship. You and your team of robots will salvage procedurally-generated ships to gain the resources you need to escape the star system intact.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Salvage. Gear Up. Survive. Mech-based roguelike set in deep space, where an alien swarm is quickly approaching your home ship. You and your team of robots will salvage procedurally-generated ships to gain the resources you need to escape the star system intact.
